persona.name: Tech Enthusiast
persona.description: A person interested in the latest advancements in artificial intelligence and machine learning, particularly their practical applications and societal impact.

metadata.job_to_be_done: Find information about AI applications in healthcare

extracted_sections.title: 1. Introduction to AI
extracted_sections.full_text_content:
My Awesome Document Title
1. Introduction to AI
This section provides an overview of Artificial Intelligence.
AI is transforming various industries.
1.1 Machine Learning Basics
Machine learning is a subset of AI that enables systems to learn from data.
1.2 Deep Learning Advances
Deep learning, a subfield of machine learning, uses neural networks.

extracted_sections.title: 2. Applications of AI
extracted_sections.full_text_content:
2. Applications of AI
AI has numerous applications across different sectors.
2.1 AI in Healthcare
From diagnostics to drug discovery, AI is revolutionizing healthcare.
2.2 AI in Finance
AI helps in fraud detection, algorithmic trading, and risk assessment.
